byline.original: By BEN SISARIO and CLAIRE CAIN MILLER

abstract: Customers who buy songs through Google's store will be able to recommend them to Google+ contacts, who can listen to them once and may be tempted to buy them.
snippet: Customers who buy songs through Google's store will be able to recommend them to Google+ contacts, who can listen to them once and may be tempted to buy them.

headline.main: Google Said to Add Social Element for Music
